message: @justinlilly i'm not sure it's possible... i wanted to delete some of my junk groups when I hit the 20 group limit, but about all i could do was leave them
@justinlilly excellent questions.... i probably should have tested that, but i didn't
its a private group too. just needless trash, I suppose.
left. now I can request to join my old group. Who gets admin for it? The remaining member?
No topics or messages in it.. not sure how to delete it.
Also ran into the same issue where leaving an rejoining has left a group without an admin
So it's now a known issue. Left a couple of orphan groups myself sorry guys

+1: I just created a group and orphaned it because it was a dupe.  I should be able to delete a group when I am the only member and there are no messages and topics in the group.  Also, it would be nice to show a list of existing groups that match the group name I entered when I am about to create a group.  //cc: @ericflo
@neil and you can quit a group and left it unmanaged (though the group is still marked as created by you)
isn't it awesome when a community is left to care for itself, with no support from "the top"? to me convore is an almost-baked product. dead in the beach, sadly
